claimUndelegatedCredit(address,uint256).details: Wrapper function around CDPVault.claimUndelegatedCredit()This function does not have the onlyDelegatecall modifier to save gas but should only be called via Proxy

params.claimForEpoch: The epoch to claim undelegatedCredit for

params.leverParams: The parameters for the lever action: `primarySwap` swap parameters to swap the collateral withdrawn from the CDPVault using the flash loan to Stablecoin `auxSwap` swap parameters to swap the collateral not used to payback the flash loan
params.residualRecipient: Optional parameter that must be provided if an `auxSwap` *is not* provided This parameter is the address to send the residual collateral to
params.subCollateral: The amount of collateral to withdraw from the position [wad]

params.credit: The amount of credit to delegate [wad]
params.creditor: The address to transfer stablecoin or swap tokens from
params.swapParams: The swap parameters for swapping an arbitrary asset to stablecoin
params.vault: The CDP Vault to delegate credit to

params.credit: The amount of credit to delegate
params.delegateVault: The CDP Vault to delegate credit to
params.depositVault: The CDP Vault to deposit collateral into

params.leverParams: The parameters for the lever action, `primarySwap` - parameters to swap Stablecoin provided by the flash loan into the collateral token `auxSwap` - parameters to swap the `upFrontToken` to the collateral token
params.permitParams: The permit parameters for the `collateralizer` to transfer `upFrontToken`
params.upFrontAmount: The amount of `upFrontToken` to transfer to the LeverAction contract [upFrontToken-Scale]
params.upFrontToken: The token to transfer up front to the LeverAction contract

params.data: The encoded data to call each address with
params.delegateCall: Whether or not to use delegatecall or call

params.data: The encoded bytes that were passed into the credit flash loan
The encoded bytes that were passed into the flash loan

params.claimForEpoch: The epoch to claim undelegatedCredit for
params.creditParams: The credit parameters for debt repayment
params.subNormalDebt: The amount of normal debt to repay [wad]

undelegate(address,uint256,uint256[]).details: Wrapper function around CDPVault.undelegateCredit()This function does not have the onlyDelegatecall modifier to save gas but should only be called via Proxy

params.prevQueuedEpochs: Array of stale epochs for which shares were queued

returns.claimableAtEpoch: Epoch at which the undelegated credit can be claimed by the delegator
returns.epoch: Epoch at which the undelegation was initiated
returns.estimatedClaim: Estimated amount of withdrawable credit, if no bad debt is accrued [wad]
returns.fixableUntilEpoch: Epoch at which the credit claim of the epoch has to be fixed by

params.claimForEpoch: The epoch to claim undelegatedCredit for
params.collateralParams: The collateral parameters for collateral withdrawal
params.delegateVault: The CDP Vault to undelegate credit from
params.subNormalDebt: The amount of normal debt to repay [wad]
params.withdrawVault: The CDP Vault to withdraw collateral from

borrow(address,address,(uint256,address,.notice: Adds debt to a CDP Vault by minting Stablecoin (and optionally swaps Stablecoin to an arbitrary token)

claimUndelegatedCredit(address,uint256).notice: Claim undelegated credit from a vault

decreaseLever((address,address,address,(.notice: Decrease the leverage of a position by taking out a credit flash loan to withdraw and sell collateral

delegateViaStablecoin(address,address,ui.notice: Swap for stablecoin or transfer stablecoin directly, then delegate to a vault

deposit(address,address,(address,uint256.notice: Adds collateral to a CDP Vault

depositAndBorrow(address,address,(addres.notice: Adds collateral and debt to a CDP Vault

depositAndDelegate(address,address,addre.notice: Adds collateral and delegates credit to a vault

increaseLever((address,address,address,(.notice: Increase the leverage of a position by taking out a flash loan and buying Stablecoin

multisend(address[],bytes[],bool[]).notice: Allows for multiple calls to be made to cover use cases not covered by the other functions

onCreditFlashLoan(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Callback function for the credit flash loan taken out in decreaseLever

onFlashLoan(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Callback function for the flash loan taken out in increaseLever

repay(address,address,(uint256,address,(.notice: Repays debt to a CDP Vault via Stablecoin (optionally swapping an arbitrary token to Stablecoin)

repayAndClaim(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Undelegate and then repay a position

withdraw(address,address,(address,uint25.notice: Removes collateral from a CDP Vault

withdrawAndClaim(address,address,address.notice: Undelegate credit from a vault and withdraw collateral from a vault

withdrawAndRepay(address,address,(addres.notice: Removes collateral and debt from a CDP Vault
